Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of a red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394138) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394138)
